name: UITableViewRowAction
desc: A single action to present when the user swipes horizontally in a table row.

items.name: init(style: UITableViewRowAction.Style, title: String?, handler: (UITableViewRowAction, IndexPath) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates and returns a new table view row action object.

items.name: var style: UITableViewRowAction.Style
items.desc: The style applied to the action button.

items.name: enum UITableViewRowAction.Style
items.desc: Constants that specify the appearance of action buttons.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title of the action button.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The background color of the action button.

items.name: var backgroundEffect: UIVisualEffect?
items.desc: The visual effect to apply to the button.
